title: FBI agents boards ship operated by same company linked to Baltimore bridge collapse
content: FBI agents boarded the Maersk Saltoro at the Port of Baltimore, managed by Synergy Marine Group, linked to a fatal bridge collapse. This action follows a lawsuit against the Dali's owner for gross negligence. The Maersk Saltoro was preparing to depart for Sri Lanka when inspected.
summary: FBI agents boarded the Maersk Saltoro at the Port of Baltimore, managed by Synergy Marine Group, linked to a fatal bridge collapse. This action follows a lawsuit against the Dali's owner for gross negligence. The Maersk Saltoro was preparing to depart for Sri Lanka when inspected.

title: Israel raids Al Jazeera's West Bank bureau, serves 45 days closure notice
content: Israeli forces raided Al Jazeera's office in Ramallah, ordering a 45-day closure without providing reasons. The Palestinian Journalists' Syndicate condemned the action as a violation of media freedom. This follows Israel's earlier revocation of Al Jazeera journalists' press credentials and a ban on the channel's operations within the country.
summary: Israeli forces raided Al Jazeera's office in Ramallah, ordering a 45-day closure without providing reasons. The Palestinian Journalists' Syndicate condemned the action as a violation of media freedom. This follows Israel's earlier revocation of Al Jazeera journalists' press credentials and a ban on the channel's operations within the country.

title: 'China continues to behave aggressively': Biden caught saying in hot mic blunder
content: During the Quad summit, US President Joe Biden was overheard via a hot mic discussing China's aggressive behavior and Xi Jinping's domestic focus. Although China wasn't directly mentioned in the joint statement, it highlighted concerns over the East and South China Seas. Efforts to reduce tensions with China were also noted.
summary: During the Quad summit, US President Joe Biden was overheard via a hot mic discussing China's aggressive behavior and Xi Jinping's domestic focus. Although China wasn't directly mentioned in the joint statement, it highlighted concerns over the East and South China Seas. Efforts to reduce tensions with China were also noted.

title: 'Couldn't have been better suited for my last foreign visit as PM': Japan's Fumio Kishida on Quad
content: Japan's Prime Minister Fumio Kishida marked his last foreign visit by attending the Quad summit, emphasizing its importance. He addressed growing global security concerns and highlighted the need for a free and open Indo-Pacific. Kishida called for practical cooperation with regional countries to ensure mutual benefits and uphold shared values like freedom and democracy.
summary: Japan's Prime Minister Fumio Kishida marked his last foreign visit by attending the Quad summit, emphasizing its importance. He addressed growing global security concerns and highlighted the need for a free and open Indo-Pacific. Kishida called for practical cooperation with regional countries to ensure mutual benefits and uphold shared values like freedom and democracy.

title: Anura Kumara Dissanayake to become Sri Lanka President: Early trends
content: Anura Kumara Dissanayake, leader of the National People's Power, is set to become Sri Lanka’s ninth executive president based on early postal voting results. Dissanayake has secured 56% of the votes, while his main opponents Sajith Premadasa and current President Ranil Wickremesinghe have each garnered 19%, indicating a likely victory for him.
summary: Anura Kumara Dissanayake, leader of the National People's Power, is set to become Sri Lanka’s ninth executive president based on early postal voting results. Dissanayake has secured 56% of the votes, while his main opponents Sajith Premadasa and current President Ranil Wickremesinghe have each garnered 19%, indicating a likely victory for him.

title: 'Defining alliance of 21st century': White House on PM Modi, President Biden bilateral ties
content: President Biden and Prime Minister Modi affirmed their commitment to the US-India Comprehensive Global and Strategic Partnership, focusing on defense, technology, space, health, and environmental cooperation. They praised India's leadership in the G-20 and humanitarian support for Ukraine. Future collaborations include semiconductor plants, space research with NASA-Isro, and clean energy projects.
summary: President Biden and Prime Minister Modi affirmed their commitment to the US-India Comprehensive Global and Strategic Partnership, focusing on defense, technology, space, health, and environmental cooperation. They praised India's leadership in the G-20 and humanitarian support for Ukraine. Future collaborations include semiconductor plants, space research with NASA-Isro, and clean energy projects.

title: Watch: President Biden places hand on PM Modi's shoulder as he answers question on Quad survival
content: President Joe Biden reassured the Quad alliance's future beyond US elections during a meeting with PM Modi, Australian PM Albanese, and Japanese PM Kishida. India will host the Quad Summit in 2025. Biden announced new initiatives for maritime technology and coast guard collaboration to enhance security in the Indo-Pacific region.
summary: President Joe Biden reassured the Quad alliance's future beyond US elections during a meeting with PM Modi, Australian PM Albanese, and Japanese PM Kishida. India will host the Quad Summit in 2025. Biden announced new initiatives for maritime technology and coast guard collaboration to enhance security in the Indo-Pacific region.

title: Deadly Israeli airstrike in Beirut kills 37
content: An Israeli airstrike in a Beirut suburb killed at least 37 people, including senior Hezbollah leaders. The attack targeted an underground meeting of Hezbollah commanders, resulting in significant casualties and damage. This escalation has heightened cross-border violence and diplomatic tensions, prompting Lebanon's Prime Minister to cancel his planned UN visit.
summary: An Israeli airstrike in a Beirut suburb killed at least 37 people, including senior Hezbollah leaders. The attack targeted an underground meeting of Hezbollah commanders, resulting in significant casualties and damage. This escalation has heightened cross-border violence and diplomatic tensions, prompting Lebanon's Prime Minister to cancel his planned UN visit.

title: 'Trump made Robinson...': Harris' campaign aims to shift voters in NC amid scandal
content: Kamala Harris' campaign is seizing the scandal surrounding North Carolina gubernatorial candidate Mark Robinson to win over Black and suburban voters. By focusing on Robinson's controversial remarks and his connection with Trump, Harris' team aims to influence voter sentiment in this key swing state, seeing it as a significant opportunity for the next election.
summary: Kamala Harris' campaign is seizing the scandal surrounding North Carolina gubernatorial candidate Mark Robinson to win over Black and suburban voters. By focusing on Robinson's controversial remarks and his connection with Trump, Harris' team aims to influence voter sentiment in this key swing state, seeing it as a significant opportunity for the next election.

Kamala Harris accepts CNN invite for second presidential debate
content: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump are scheduled for a second presidential debate on October 23, organized by CNN. Harris's campaign stressed the significance of another debate for voters' assessment. The format mirrors their previous encounter, which Trump commended. The Trump campaign has not yet issued a response.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump are scheduled for a second presidential debate on October 23, organized by CNN. Harris's campaign stressed the significance of another debate for voters' assessment. The format mirrors their previous encounter, which Trump commended. The Trump campaign has not yet issued a response.

title: Mark Robinson's lewd comments removed after CNN report
content: Mark Robinson, the Republican candidate for North Carolina governor, faces criticism following a CNN report uncovering offensive comments he made on a pornographic website. Although there are calls for him to withdraw from the race against Democrat Josh Stein, he remains on the ballot. The issue has garnered attention from both Trump and Harris.
summary: Mark Robinson, the Republican candidate for North Carolina governor, faces criticism following a CNN report uncovering offensive comments he made on a pornographic website. Although there are calls for him to withdraw from the race against Democrat Josh Stein, he remains on the ballot. The issue has garnered attention from both Trump and Harris.

title: Why is Cards Against Humanity suing Elon Musk's SpaceX?
18-year-old woman arrested after crushing man under wheels of his own Porsche, see video
content: An 18-year-old Canadian woman named Sarah Badshaw has been arrested for stealing a Porsche and injuring its owner in Mississauga. Captured on a doorbell camera, she faces charges like dangerous operation causing bodily harm and theft. The stolen vehicle was later found abandoned in the same area.
summary: An 18-year-old Canadian woman named Sarah Badshaw has been arrested for stealing a Porsche and injuring its owner in Mississauga. Captured on a doorbell camera, she faces charges like dangerous operation causing bodily harm and theft. The stolen vehicle was later found abandoned in the same area.
